about_the_game:
A lost kitty. A dangerous environment. It's snowing.
Where Are My Mittens is a 2D pixelart platformer about trying to find Mittens, a kitty that has been separated from their owner. Play through 30 unseparated rooms of platforming and traversal using a unique dash ability constrained to dash crystals meticulously placed in rooms.

Playtime: ~20 mins
Desktop-Only, requires QWERTY keyboard and mouse.
detailed_description:
A lost kitty. A dangerous environment. It's snowing.
Where Are My Mittens is a 2D pixelart platformer about trying to find Mittens, a kitty that has been separated from their owner. Play through 30 unseparated rooms of platforming and traversal using a unique dash ability constrained to dash crystals meticulously placed in rooms.

Playtime: ~20 mins
Desktop-Only, requires QWERTY keyboard and mouse.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS Big Sur
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended to use the latest architecture.

name: Where Are My Mittens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (For particle lag)
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended to use the latest architecture.

short_description: A lost kitty. A dangerous environment. It's snowing. A cute indie platformer about a boy named Jason looking for a kitty named Mittens. Requires a standard qwerty keyboard and mouse. Compatible with MacOS and Windows.
